instructions: From your Home screen, swipe right until you get to the Apps page, then search for " Alexa ." Download the Amazon Alexa app. After it automatically installs, tap Amazon Alexa on your Home screen to launch it. Enter your name and tap Continue . Set up phone verification by entering your phone number and confirming the code sent to you. Alternatively, you can tap SKIP and set up phone verification later; just tap the speech bubble at the bottom of the Alexa app home screen. After a brief tutorial, you can start making the most of Amazon's voice assistant.
